short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cmment is an extension that adds a comment section to every page on the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Cmment, you can comment and reads comments specific to the page you are currently browsing. Every comment is saved on the r/cmment Reddit community. This extension queries directly Reddit, no third-party servers involved, and no personal data is collected or stored.

Whats New:
0.1.3 Minor bug fixes, lowered caching time and increased querying times significantly
